title: Save more than $200 on Rosetta Stone and learn a new language this year
content:
Macworld

If learning a new language was one of your New Year’s resolutions, then you’re in luck. Through January 21st, we’re offering Rosetta Stone for one of the best prices you’ll find all year.

Trusted for nearly three decades by international organizations like TripAdvisor and NASA, Rosetta Stone is considered by many to be the gold standard of language learning. The intuitive curriculum uses bite-sized lessons and a methodology that mimics how you learned your native language as a child. Plus, with proprietary technology like TruAccent, Rosetta Stone helps you master reading, writing, and speaking a language faster than night classes or other platforms.

You can get lifetime access to all 25 languages in the Rosetta Stone library with this deal. Now through 11:59 pm PT on January 21, get Rosetta Stone for 62% off $399 at just $149.97 when you use code ROSETTA.
